open.title: Fibre connectivity problems
open.description: We are aware of a connectivity problem affecting our fibre clients. Our engineers are busy looking at the problem, and hope to have it resolved as soon as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Metrofibre outage | Bluff, Durban
open.description: Metrofibre has informed us of a network outage affecting Bluff, Durban, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Metrofibre engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.

open.title: MetroFibre maintenance | Pietermaritzburg
open.description: MetroFibre is conducting maintenance in Pietermaritzburg on the 9th of June from 06:00 to 12:00 users affected will experience limited to no connectivity during the maintenance window. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
